analysis.description: Minibitcoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol:
	Contract Minibitcoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol#139-142)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Minibitcoin.claimToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol#216-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol#219-222)

Minibitcoin.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x7e8c149f70437eba6785f9059190a5b08abf03de.sol
